text: Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam is a state political party in the Indian states of Tamil Nadu and Puducherry. It is a Dravidian party founded by C. N. Annadurai in 1949 . Since 1969, DMK has been headed by Karunanidhi, who has served as Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu several times. DMK holds the distinction of being the first party other than the Indian National Congress to win state-level elections with a clear majority on its own in any state in India. Present President of DMK Party is M. K. Stalin. ==References== Category:Political parties in Tamil Nadu Category:1949 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in India
title: Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam
